verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H681>hard<s%> by the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> that I may <S%H1961>have<s%> it for a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H7138>near<s%> to my <S%H1004>house:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you for it a <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> than it; <S%H176>or,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H1961>seem<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4242>worth<s%> of it in <S%H3701>money.<s%>

And <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it me, that I should <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> to you.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5620>heavy<s%> and <S%H2198>displeased<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him: for he had <S%H559>said,<s%> I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers.<s%> And he <S%H7901>laid<s%> him <S%H7901>down<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and <S%H5437>turned<s%> away his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and would <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

But <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him, and <S%H1696>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> is your <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H2088>so<s%> <S%H5620>sad,<s%> that you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread?<s%>

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> to her, <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> for <S%H3701>money;<s%> or else, <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H2655>please<s%> you, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you another <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> for it: and he <S%H559>answered,<s%> I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you my <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

And <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Do you <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6213>govern<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry:<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

So she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in <S%H256>Ahab's<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> them with his <S%H2368>seal,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and to the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> that were in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> with <S%H5022>Naboth.<s%>

And she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%>

And <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> him, to <S%H5749>bear<s%> <S%H5749>witness<s%> against him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You did <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%> And then <S%H3318>carry<s%> him out, and <S%H5619>stone<s%> him, that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> even the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> in his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them, and as it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them.
They <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> him: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> <S%H579>witnessed<s%> against him, even against <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> saying, <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> did <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king.<s%> Then they <S%H3318>carried<s%> him <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5619>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> that he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
Then they <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H348>Jezebel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and is <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you for <S%H3701>money:<s%> for <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is not <S%H2416>alive,<s%> but <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> to <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of it.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is in the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he is <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Have you <S%H7523>killed,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> taken <S%H3423>possession?<s%> And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>licked<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> shall <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>lick<s%> your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H859>yours.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> Have you <S%H4672>found<s%> me, O my <S%H341>enemy?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> you: <S%H3282>because<s%> you have <S%H4376>sold<s%> yourself to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on you, and will <S%H1197>take<s%> away your <S%H310>posterity,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> him that <S%H8366>urinates<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and him that is <S%H6113>shut<s%> up and <S%H5800>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> for the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you have provoked me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> and made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

And of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> by the <S%H2426>wall<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

Him that <S%H4191>dies<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat;<s%> and him that <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

But there was <S%H3808>none<s%> like to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> did <S%H4376>sell<s%> himself to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5496>stirred<s%> up.

And he did <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8581>abominably<s%> in <S%H3212>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H1544>idols,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> things as <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3423>cast<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H328>softly.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7200>See<s%> you <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H3665>humbles<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> me? <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H3665>humbles<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> me, I will not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> in his <S%H3117>days:<s%> but in his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> on his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
